Content:: Samvel Sahakyan (Armenian: Սամվել Սահակյան; c. 1961 – July 7, 2022)[1] was an Armenian musical artist known for his Armenian dance music albums including Christina (1988), Anahitis (1992), Nerir Ays Angam (1995) and Non-Stop Armenian Dance (2004).[2] Sahakyan was a resident of Los Angeles, California at the time of his death.[1]  This article on an Armenian musician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
